website_summaries.verdict: While you are going to need a clear line of sight to use the remote, this attractive tower heater provides you with full control over the temperature of your room.
pros: Has 2 heat settings with max output of 1,500 watts in addition to ECO setting
Temperature range from 40 degrees Fahrenheit to 95 degrees Fahrenheit
Overheating and tip-over protection and carrying handle
cons: Noise may be too loud for some
Remote can be difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this space heater for my living room which has a vaulted ceiling in hopes of getting it bit warmer. I am very happy at the outcome. This heater really makes the room warmer without having to turn up the furnace. It's not like I can turn down the furnace now, but it does make the room warmer. It is very quiet and I really like the oscillating feature. It's not obtrusive and it looks good. I have since bought another for my son's bedroom which tends to be too cool in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: suntechpc

customer_reviews.title: Warm, quiet and safety
customer_reviews.text: I love this heater! I had an old radiant heater before I bought this one. The radiant heater used a lot of electricity, the thermostat was not reliable and its metal case could get very hot. This ceramic heater stays cool to the touch, has a very accurate thermostat, a remote (I love that feature) and it heats a medium room very quickly. The auto off feature comes in handy. It can be set to shut off from 1 to 8 hours. Its also pretty quiet except the beeps when you push a button on the heater or remote.
customer_reviews.author: Jush Owen

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Smart
customer_reviews.text: The tower heater was such a life saver. We were in an office space that was constantly always cold whether it was summer or winter time. Once we received the tower heater and used it, it was fantastic! I couldn't believe how fast it heated the whole office space. When the room reached a certain temperature, it was so smart to shut off itself, We didn't even need to get out of our seats. I would highly recommend the ceramic tower heater with the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this heater. It heats a small room well and pretty good with a medium room. The floor stays cool and undamaged, the machine itself stays cool while pushing out heat, I can run it all night and not worry about a fire. It performs very well, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erice

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: I live in the apartment in Madison, Wisconsin and my apartment doesn't have a heater in my room. It is winter now and I get really cold at night and during sleep. After reading the customer reviews thoroughly, I decided to purchase this heater and I REALLY love this heater!! I always turn this on when I go to bed and this heater makes my whole room super warm and cozy. The remote control works very well that I don't have to get up in my bed to change the control on the heater. I use this heater everyday and very satisfied with this product! This heater is worthy buying!
customer_reviews.author: Seungmin K.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for its size
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in an open floor plan basement. The basement is 730sq ft rectangular shape with 6’6” ceiling. In 1 hour it raised the temp from 63 deg to 71deg. Would be interesting to see how this small unit performs on colder days.
customer_reviews.author: PharmD

customer_reviews.title: Great Room Heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a great room heater! I bought this for my office, its a corner room with all windows. So my room is cold in the winter and hot in the summer. Since I do massage, I need a warm room and this heater heat up my room to a toasty 72-74 degrees very quickly with the setting at 68 degrees. It's quiet too, what a great bonus! The down side is the remote has a very short distance, so unless I'm literally a few feet away it doesn't work. So not helpful there. Really a very minor inconvenience. Overall I'm extremely satisfied and happy with my purchase!!! Highly recommend if you have a large room that is always cold.
customer_reviews.author: N_K

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my back kitchen area, its a part of the house that always stays just a little chilly, and i worry about my pipes, after researching them i decided on this one...I love it, you can set the temp for what you want and it turns off when it reaches the temp you choose...I am so impressed with this and its energy saving eco setting I bought one for my son and his family for Christmas...I am very pleased and would and did buy it again...thanks you dkchandler
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE K CHANDLER

customer_reviews.title: Emits strong heat that could be dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but is basically a tall column that emits powerful heat. A pet or child could be burned when passing. Personally I did not find it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: It works well in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it works well in my bedroom but it will only work on automatic on the low speed. Which is only about 750 watts, it does have three speeds. The remote control only works when its Pointed towards the face of the heater and I find many of this type of heaters do the same thing. I leave it on rotate and when it turns back towards me I can change the settings. Not bad little heater.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Delahoussaye

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, returned it!!
customer_reviews.text: The heater did not work. Read instructions and still couldn't get it to work. Casing felt cheap and not worth the cost of the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Mmc

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and keeps my room at 65, but it doesn't have a schedule feature.
customer_reviews.text: The only useful time feature it has is a timer. You can set it for x hours and it will turn off when the time is up. However, I would find it useful if it would turn on before I get home, turn off between midnight and 5am, etc to save on power. Nevertheless, it heats up my room pretty well above the garage with little insulation pretty well. Costs me about $60/month at 8.7 cents per kwh, so the efficiency is okay.
customer_reviews.author: realdavidmckee

customer_reviews.title: Warms up room
customer_reviews.text: Heater works as advertised but remote is difficult to use
customer_reviews.author: yvonne harris

customer_reviews.title: Great value for this amazing heater
customer_reviews.text: My wife said “ it is just perfect “ the remote control and versatility of this heater are incomparable with other heaters. The style is very modern and exquisite, very quiet and its oscillating tower design makes it look sophisticated in our room . Odorless , some heaters smell like something is burning , this heater doesn’t smell at all The best of the best 10 stars for this great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Domìnguez

customer_reviews.title: quiet and warm
customer_reviews.text: I use space heaters in a 1200 SF rented yoga studio space. The unusually cold weather this fall prompted me to add another. Heaters in a yoga studio need to be small, quiet and heat well. This one does all three. I was surpised how well it heated for it's size which is smaller than I pictured it to be. It's very quiet! I have another space heater that blows the air, and this one is much quieter. Easy to talk and play music over no problem. I plugged it in in my 50 degree office first which is about 10x15' and it was warm within minutes. If I need another I would buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heat Performance At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This heater is amazing. It literally heats our whole first floor drafty farmhouse. Now that colder weather is upon us we only have to plug this in and set on 68 degrees instead of using the wood stove. We are very pleased with the appearance and lack of bulkiness, despite its great performance. The remote control works great as well as using the buttons on the machine...very easy to understand. Extremely happy we got this heater, can’t believe the performance for the very small price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really love it!Warm my room up so quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater due to the chill winter,it only does take like about 3 second to warm your room. Besides,I love that it oscillates and has a remote. Which allows me to adjust the temp from across the room.In addition,We are able to set a specific temperature we want and the heater will shut off as soon as it’s reached. It also looks nice and isn’t an eyesore.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Safe for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this product! I have a finished basement in my house that was remodeled as an after thought. As such our forced air heating doesn’t get in there. Despite that our 3 year old has adopted it as her hang out zone to play with toys and watch TV! I wanted a safe heater to use down there and this covers the entire room. I set the thermostat to 68 and leave it. It keeps the entire space at a constant temp but the main thing for me is that it’s not hot to touch if my daughter knocks it. Great unit and plan to order another!
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: It's a heater and it heats. With a timer and a remote... so remotely and on time as well.
customer_reviews.text: It's colored black, which makes it look fast. Which is unecessary for a heater I guess, but would be cool for a car. It swivels which means the heat blows from side to side which moves the heat around a bit. It has a remote so when you are cold in the morning you don't have to get out of bed to turn it on providing you can find it. It has a timer also, so it can be set to turn on before you wake up if you were organized, but then you wouldn't have lost the remote would you?. So yeah... a heater that heats. Wooo!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Overloads the surge protector
customer_reviews.text: I simply can’t use this product: it overloads the power supply and it trips the circuit breaker.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Reliable portable heater
customer_reviews.text: The feature we like the most is the temperature control. It can be set as low as 55 degrees, which is perfect for keeping the entry area warm in winter. The entry is at the bottom of 18 stairs and the heat in the condo doesn't warm this area. There are two doors to the outside so even with weather stripping and a storm door, the area is cold in winter, especially since it faces north and usually gets the brunt of winter storms and high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The eco mode allows you to set a temperature and it senses when it needs to turn on and off to keep the room at that temperature. That's a great feature that keeps you from having to turn it on and off all the time. I also like the remote. It's simple and easy to use. Allows you to quickly adjust the temperature without having to get up. It also heats up the room quickly. Overall it works great and exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little heater!
customer_reviews.text: I love this heater! My basement is so cold and so is my son. He is always complaining how cold he is so I decided to get a heater for the basement where my son plays his video games. In no time, this heater warms up the room at only 62 degrees! You can set it to any desired temperature and set a timer for how long you want it on. My son even works it. I was worried about my thick carpet and it being thin and tall but it works fine on carpet and if it falls over the tip safety feature will turn it off. I researched many heaters and I'm glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen Shave

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm while you worry about lead exposure
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use. Ready to go out of the box. Should indicate in manual that remote only works if pointed directly at heater. Warning on box regarding lead is disturbing.
customer_reviews.author: Prime shopper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but an awe inspiring power hog
customer_reviews.text: It heats my apartment really fast and efficiently, but for whatever reason, the remote control makes the heater draw enough power to trip my apartment's breakers. And I can't run the microwave while the heater's on. Or run any of my consoles. An excellent heater, but you absolutely need to make sure you have outlets that can handle the load.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Rapid heating and nice controls
customer_reviews.text: This heater works quite well. It has a rapid heat-up time, the fan works well and the eco setting is listed as using less energy to heat up a space. The included remote does a good job, though it needs to be aimed at just the right area or it doesn't register. The oscillating function is quiet and does a great job of heating up a small space quickly as well. In my test, it rapidly warmed up a small room and I could hear the thermostat kick off when it reached the temperature I specified. In short, it performs well and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed when I first opened the box, thinking this isn’t big enough to heat the main area of my basement apartment. Having Parkinson’s Disease, I get chilled very easily, even in the summer, especially with air conditioning. I turned this on and put it on oscillate and was pleasantly surprised at how well and how quickly it took the chill off of the entire great room. Winter is coming and I have high hopes for what this ceramic tower heater can do. I like the safety feature with having my young grandson around, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: It’s quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Love how fast it heats up and how quiet it is. The cord gets a little warm but not hot. I love the space heater. I can turn it on for 30 minutes prior to getting out of bed and walk to my shower without freezing. I bought this space heater to take the edge off the cold in my room during the fall/cold season and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Maricruz

customer_reviews.title: Are these reviews real?
customer_reviews.text: The remote barely operates the heater. Most of the time, it doesn’t work. If I set the temp to a certain number, it will heat to a much higher temp and not turn off automatically. I can’t set it for a certain length of time. I am completely unhappy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Diane Roche Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: In 30 degree weather, this heater is capable of making my small bedroom hot enough for me to sweat. Also, the feature to set a target temperature, which the heater maintains by shutting off and kicking back on automatically, is very nice. There was somewhat of a smell which has since died away, and the unit has worked reliably since.
customer_reviews.author: Sotep

customer_reviews.title: Refund/fire
customer_reviews.text: The plug in melted and almost started a fire. I want a refund I would not trust this item
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this heater!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve put this heater to the test and absolutely love it. Heats our bedroom no problem. It’s super slim so finding a space in our already furniture-filled bedroom was an easy task. The oscillate feature is a HUGE plus. It definitely helps cycle the hot air so it doesn’t run nearly as long as our old one in order to heat our bedroom. All in all this heater is a must have for those that don’t have access to central heat. A couple of these and you’re good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Topher and Sara Madden

customer_reviews.title: Great heater! Bad remote control.
customer_reviews.text: The heater is great! Gets the room very hot quickly, and the thermostat function works well also. HOWEVER, I bought this one because it had a remote and I had the dream of being able to remotely turn it on in the morning before I got out of bed in the winter to warm up the room. The remote, unfortunately, only works when you are less than 1-2 feet away...which kind of negates the function of a remote. Wondering if I was just sent a faulty one? Good heater, bad remote. Which is unfortunate since that is the only reason why I purchased this particular one...
customer_reviews.author: Laurela2020

customer_reviews.title: Excellent radiator at a really good price
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, does the job spot on, gets unbelievably hot on full power, timer works excellent, got this for my garage which has no heating and always felt cold and damp, now it's warm and no smell of damp in the air, warms my garage up perfectly, (standard sized garage but with a double glazed window and door added)
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Nice little rotating ( or not) heater
customer_reviews.text: For those occasional cold nights in Florida, this is handy to take into the bathroom at shower time or to heat up the bed room before bedtime or in the morning when I do my stretching. Use it, sometimes, when we are watching TV, in the evening. Better than spending a fortune buying better windows.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Helfand

customer_reviews.title: This is placed in my child's room, I am very at ease.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to buy this heater and put it in my son's room, I am very at ease. It adjusts the temperature and it stops when it reaches the temperature you set. When the temperature is lower than the temperature you have adjusted, it starts running again. This is placed in my child's room, I am very at ease.
customer_reviews.author: Xuehua

customer_reviews.title: Warms up my 12x12 room easily on low setting
customer_reviews.text: GREAT space heater! I'm disabled so the remote is extremely important. The only problem is the unit must be fast-forward and you have to aim remote straight towards it, dead center. If its turned off while on the "sweep" mode and facing towards the left or right, the remote won't work, again, unless you can reach far enough to aim it at front of heater. Other than that I love it and highly recommend it!! I'm in a 12x12 room that's on the lower floor, so it's very cool year round. The heater works great even on the low setting.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing heater
customer_reviews.text: This was the weakest fan & could not heat my bathroom after 3 hour. Our bathroom is not huge. I was so disappointed & had already threw away the box or I would have sent this thing back. I’m wondering if this was just a defective heater because this heater does not live up to the reviews I saw on here
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Liking it so far. Heats up the room quickly and can even heat my stairwell and hallway when on high. I usually run it for about an hour or so before turning it off and the heat usually sticks around for another hour or so. Easy to use. The little remote it came with was super useful before I almost immediately misplaced it. Never too hot to the touch. Overall good, sleek heater.
customer_reviews.author: zebrye

customer_reviews.title: Excellent space heater
customer_reviews.text: Maybe not the most aesthetically pleasing heater out there, but it's lightweight, easily portable from room to room and heats up quickly while still being cool to the touch. I keep this in my drafty master bedroom. The remote doesn't have a button to charge it from high to low to eco. That's my major complaint about it
customer_reviews.author: A. Diggs

customer_reviews.title: Overheats quickly
customer_reviews.text: The cord overheats within 15min of having it on. This is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Meliisa

customer_reviews.title: Great heat output
customer_reviews.text: Our home heater went out and while we were waiting for it to get replaced, we purchased this space heater for our bedroom . It was 20 degrees one night, and I woke up sweating. This thing really works! I have since adjusted the setting and gotten it at a comfortable temperature, but I’m very impressed with the heat output.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine guess

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to warm up if the room is really cold. Does get really warm once it reaches the set temp. Fan is pretty weak so if you want direct heat then you have to sit fairly close. Timer function is nice. The remote has to be fairly close to the unit to function.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Love this heater
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater it is streamline and puts out a lot of heat without the blower/fan being loud/white noise. It is extremely quiet which was very important to me I hardly can tell it's on except that the room gets warmer... it's perfect. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sedona Woman

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product, exactly at advertised. This product expressly heats my moderately sized bedroom to the desired temperature in a matter of minutes. The remote allows for universal accessibility when necessary. The oscillation, timing, and various speed features also allow for customization and ultimate comfort. The safety of the product is also outstanding. You really have to try to knock it over in order to do so. The self-balance of the product outperforms other space heaters. The silence of the product is also something to take into account. For the price, this space heater outperforms others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aikoper Space Heater, 1500W Ceramic Tower Heater, Portable Electric Oscillating Heater
customer_reviews.text: Just received this Aikoper Space Heater and really like the use and the heat output that comes out of it. I did my homework and found out that this space heater is one that I will enjoy and highly recommend if you are going to purchase a space heater and also like the Oscillating with Adjustable Thermostat, ECO Mode, Remote Control, 8-Hrs Timer. To all that is looking for a space heater -- this is the one that I truly recommend to purchase, you will not be disappointed in your purchase -- just love the heat output. Kindly, Kathy McHugh 312 Katie Dr Feasterville-Trevose, PA 19053
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater
customer_reviews.text: Heater seems to work well. I like the cool down feature when you turn it off so it doesn’t stay hot. The thermostat doesn’t seem to be 100% accurate but a little toying with it and I can get it to the temperature I want, even if the display reads a lower/higher temperature. It really does shut itself off if it’s tipped over!
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: I love this heater!
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of using the machine, I am very happy. The heater warms the room very quickly and I love the osculating feature. I have about 3 different types of these space heaters and this is near the top in performance. There are "low" and "high" and "ECO" options and I like how I can adjust the temperature of the heater. The remote is convenient. A good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and powerful heater
customer_reviews.text: Before this heater I had a bionaire heater. Was looking for something similar, and this little guy delivered! Heats up normal sized bedrooms in less than 10 minutes! This light weight and sleek design of a heater has an amazing heat output! I've had this for a month now and haven't had any problems besides the cord getting a little hot. Its also more silent than my previous heater which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Very good heater
customer_reviews.text: It does a fine job in my code correct, insulated overhead door 20x20x9ft ceiling garage. i have a kind of "man cave" area in my garage and this heater does fine. Takes it a bit to warm the area but has no problem keeping the area comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Daduce

customer_reviews.title: Whatever you do do not lose the control for this heater
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit very much I have a few things I don’t like about the unit when you try to use it manually especially with the sleep timer it wants to bounce between a few different settings in the unit that I don’t understand and I have to always pick up the remote to get it to go between an hour and two hour which is sometimes a pain because I can’t understand what it saying when It’s blinking when I do it manually so if you lose the control you’re in trouble
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Automatically come on and heat up the house
customer_reviews.text: Great heater that I bought!love the time setting function,I can set the heating time,It can automatically heat up the room when it reach to the time.I also can set the shut-off time while heating.It is a good deal for the temp setting! event 30°outside keeps the temperature in the home are they warm it also goes from side to side it has a auto button where if I set it to 75°if it drops below a certain degree I don’t have to worry about anything it will automatically come on and heat up the house。GOOD DESIGN!!
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Exceed to my expection!Great portable heater!
customer_reviews.text: before I buy this type heater,I thick it is so expensive.But after I receive and use the heater,it is really worth the money! it throws a lot of heat on high & on low it’s very comfortable. I also like the different temp settings. The heater is quiet.Don’t worry about the noise which have a bad effect on your sleeping!Excellent heater!I am so glad I choose this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little heater, it’s got nice output and is very quiet. No complaints about the heater itself but looses a star based on the remote. The remote is finicky and you either have to push it “just right” for it to work, is with the strength of the Incredible Hulk. It mostly works, but since it’s going in a bedroom, a more functional remote would be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Fan is loud. The remote is already falling apart and I rarely used it. Also the battery died within 2 weeks. The eco temperature setting is nice at keeping my room close to the set temperature. Also in eco it stays on more than 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice for a portable heater
customer_reviews.text: This space is very awesome. It’s work’s very in oscillating mode. The remote works very nice not just to turn the unit on but to adjust the temperature. It also has a timer feature. The unit is wort every dollar. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Clarkie

customer_reviews.title: Toasty and Great
customer_reviews.text: I live in a farmhouse. I love it, but my upstairs is drafty. This little heater is so efficient. I love it. I just got it, but see no issues at all it’s been on low all day and is perfectly toasty upstairs. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Songpeddlar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heater with Critical Safety Features
customer_reviews.text: This tower room heater is my 1st Aikpper product, but it won't be the last. I love that I can set the temperature I want & it shuts off when the temperature is reached. More importantly, the safety features are critical. Used it last night & was very pleased with it's heating capacity. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Larlazenby

customer_reviews.title: A very good heater for warming up any room quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This heater is very easy to use and gives out a good amount of heat. I have part of my house where I keep the door shut to keep cats out and this area gets very cold. The heater is perfect for keeping this space at a comfortable temperature. The heater has a hi, low and economy setting. The economy setting is great for setting the temperature you want the room and then leaving it on to maintain that temperature.
customer_reviews.author: VRaybould

customer_reviews.title: Does What I Bought It to Do
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to heat a screen room that we had enclosed. It made the room very comfortable and is quiet. I just wish the icons on the remote and on the unit were identical. Also, I have a Hi, Lo, temperature mode. I don't see ECO.
customer_reviews.author: RVandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking heater and very effective for a larger room.
customer_reviews.text: A heater that can be controlled while lying in bed! Starts off on high and within a few minutes heats a large bedroom so then I turn to half power setting where it continues to maintain a comfortable temperature.
customer_reviews.author: GeoR_Sr

customer_reviews.title: Warm quiet and really well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Well designed. Space efficient. Thoughtful details. Much quieter than my lasco. And warmer. Well worth extra cost for the quiet and the details and well made remote etc. Thought wasn’t as warm just mentally due to how quiet it is until I switched rooms to use this one in office, smaller room and lasco in bedroom which is huge. Had to switch back to this in bedroom as put out way too much heat for the smaller office. Might not sound like it’s kicking out the heat, but it is!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Definitely no regrets. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I kept buying cheap heaters and I presume it's the reason for cheap results. I was tired of the failures so this time I really upgraded. No regrets. The distance the heat radiates will all me to sleep well without freezing. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Chue

customer_reviews.title: Exterior gets hot to touch
customer_reviews.text: It gets very hot to touch. I was hoping the outside of the heater wouldn't get so hot so I wouldn't have to worry about our kids if they touched it or bumped it over.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Warm warm
customer_reviews.text: Great Heater warms up a small place instantly. I’d say a 150sq feet.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: This heater is awesome! I've used it for some times now so I feel comfortable writing a review. The heater is incredibly warm and heats up quickly. I've used it in several different rooms now and all rooms heated up quickly without taking forever. You can change the temperature settings on it which I really like or have it run continuously. I only bought this one after my other one broke (it was from a different company) after just a few months and I am happy I went with this model instead of my previous one. Overall, I'm really happy and would recommend this heater to anyone looking to stay warm!
customer_reviews.author: Rndm Cstmr

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to you
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it. It is not complicated to use. Very simplistic. The remote is great. You don’t have to get up & lower or higher. Heat that comes out is perfect as well. We feel we made a great buy
customer_reviews.author: MilesDavis

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the BEST space heater I've ever used! I was so happy the day it arrived and was surprised how much better it was than my old Lasko. I feel safe with it on and I love the eco mode. Highly recommend. Wish I had this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Kamy

customer_reviews.title: First Class  Performance
customer_reviews.text: It is really quick to warm up my bedroom on a cold night. It's really quiet. It fully adjustable so you can sleep in a comfortable room that's at what ever temperature you want.
customer_reviews.author: JCTucson

customer_reviews.title: Quick heat at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, it heats up very quickly, unlike an oil based heater that I've also used. You have the option for high, low, and eco levels of heat which is nice. You can also set a thermostat when using the eco level, although I wish the thermostat could also be used in high or low settings. You also have the option of having the heater oscillate some which is a nice feature. Overall a great heater and a good price. If I could use the thermostat control on the high and low heat settings, I would give it five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Cranks out great heat
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandmother the button on the remote her soft small fingers can’t get the controls to press very easy. Now for me a man in my 40’s very simple and maybe my large hands help but for her not easy.
customer_reviews.author: Shane bowen

customer_reviews.title: I'm finally warm!
customer_reviews.text: I pulled this heater out of the box 15 minutes ago and plugged it in in my 12x12 office. My office has been hovering around 60 degrees for the last 2 months. I've had a space heater that seemed to do nothing. I am thrilled to say that I am finally warm! The warmth blowing out of the heater is so soothing and pleasant. The features are nice. It's easy to adjust and control. I love it...even though it's only been about 15 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: JJ Ram

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heater!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this heater as a Christmas present to warm up the downstairs game room. It delivered on time, and the box was in good shape. The directions were simple to understand. It has high, low, and eco settings. It warmed up quickly. It warmed up a 20' by 20' room in less than 15 minutes. The emergency tip over worked as described. We tested the remote up to 16 feet away and it worked great! My favorite thing about this heater is that it is really quiet, even on the high speed! We would recommend this heater to homes with children.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little heater
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little heater. I use this under my desk at work and I can only use it in low or I’d be sweating even on the coldest days. I use the timer feature too, no issues so far. (3 weeks of regular use)
customer_reviews.author: C. Stover

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: We love this heater, it is very quiet and heats a large space. We have a large bathroom and this heater heats the entire space in a short amount of time. The remote control is a great feature. You can have it oscillate or stay in one area, it is easy to adjust controls. The heat can be set at high or low and then you can adjust the temperature from there. It is very light weight and easy to pick up and move around. Looks great too! would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Humiston

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way except I wish that it had a timer to start the heater, just like does to shut the heater off. Otherwise this has been a life-changing item which allows me to wake up early without freezing my a$$ off and warm up the room quickly, without ever needing to leave my bed. The only thing that's super weird, is that when I hit one of the buttons on the heater remote, my Fire Tv turns on. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem to do the job
customer_reviews.text: I just received this heater. Seems to pump out sufficient heat right away for a very chilly downstairs bedroom. I expect it will keep my guests cozy during our Northern California winters.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great heater for winter times
customer_reviews.text: Received and used this heater today. It works great and I love the swing and timer function. This heater definitely warms up my room way quicker than my previous heater, which didn’t have the swing function. The timer allows me to have a nice warm sleep without worrying about it overheating. The remote control just makes everything more convenient. It’s working good so far so... I’d say this heater is as advertised and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Hiu

customer_reviews.title: Quickly heating up☀️
customer_reviews.text: I saw a discount and bought it in advance in preparation for the winter.I have tried it some times to make sure it work .First,it is a gentle heat that does not dry out the air like some others I have had.Then,the remote is very handy as well.My favor thing is heater turning on/off automatically . Save more energy!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for such a price!!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what i wanted for heating a large and cold room! 3 seconds to heat up which save me from the chill air.temp setting function is a good design to use,which can set the temp that I hope.My favourite function is the quiet feature which can not affect my sleeping in the winter night.Definitely love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Wang Ping

customer_reviews.title: How lucky that buy this heater!
customer_reviews.text: Love the oscillation function which help distribute the warmth evenly. Remote control is very nice for my mother who is inconvenient to walk. I just don’t worry about the safety due to the tip-over and over-heat protection which is very use-friendly! Very pleased with this heater!!
customer_reviews.author: Johana Valle

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: Easy intuitive panel. No assembly required. Rapidly turns on wirh burst if heat. Auto shut off is a good feature. Warms up 12 x12 dining room very quickly. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Smooth warm wind and heat up instantly
customer_reviews.text: The design is pretty good including inside and outside. It heats up quickly like in 10 seconds and its wind is smooth. The control panel is on its top and pretty convenient to see its current setting. As a heater, its basic functionality satisfies me well. But I would like to replace its button and controller with some high quality one. Since this kind of button can be hard to press after long time usage.
customer_reviews.author: hei

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater
customer_reviews.text: I have had this heater for a couple of weeks now and I am very happy with it. It looks very nice and fits in any room. It heats up a good size room quickly. The heater is very quiet so it won't interfere with anything else you are doing, like sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: definitely love
customer_reviews.text: The heater is very portable to move around through the handle equipped.It does exactly what it is supposed to do and really quiet & efficient.Heat my unheated space very nicely only about 3 seconds.I haven’t run into my concerns,because it will turn off if it’s over heating or it falls down.The remote is easy to control the heater and convenient.All in all,really love it!Say goodbye for the unbearable winter!
customer_reviews.author: qiu

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, seems ok. The remote is not the best though (not responsive) and also changes my air purifier settings (the air purifier was next to it when I set it up).
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: I love my new heater
customer_reviews.text: It is VERY quiet and heats my small back room very well. The remote is easy to use. Arrived promptly in excellent condition. Time will tell how energy efficient it is and how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra DeLony

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet! Awesome heater!
customer_reviews.text: Very love the overall color shape,simple and generous.It stay cool to the touch,the heater can be operated effortlessly.Besides,it is so quiet to use in the baby room,and you can barely tell the thing is on!Amazingly,I don’t have to worry about the safety even though my naughty pets,really like the over-heat and the tip-over protection.Great value!
customer_reviews.author: josh xiao

customer_reviews.title: Definitely need
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater. My boyfriend complained about my old one since it was so noisy. This one is very quiet and I have not had one complaint from anyone on noise. Definitely buy if you’re needing a space heater!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Remote sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The heater was okay for the price. The remote on the other hand really sucked. You had to aim directly at the front of the heater for it to work, so when the heater is in swivel mode, you end up getting missed connection. The distance for the remote to work is also not great. You had to be within 5 feet for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Daily Dose

customer_reviews.title: Yes I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this heater for 9 months now. I’m very happy with it, bought it for my daughters room she’s one and it would get really cold. I love how you set a certain temperature and it would show me on the baby monitor too, never exceeding the temperature. I’ll be purchasing another this year for my other daughter. Can’t use the remote from another room , won’t work. Steady, never tipped over .
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to move around.
customer_reviews.text: This works as promised. Super quick to heat up. I don't use the remote like I thought I would. Mostly use to warmup bathroom in the mornings. I like the hand hold at the top.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ahola

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: The heater heats up fast and definitely does well in closed rooms. The features are nice with modes such as High, Low, or keeping the room a certain temperature. The remote works well too. A really nice feature is that upon shutting down it will blow air to cool the coils, prolonging the heaters life. The buttons when pressed make loud noises and at night can be a problem but other than that its a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Warm..Warm..Warm
customer_reviews.text: If you want to warm up a room without running central heat, this is for you. Perfect for our den and TV viewing. This Aikoper Space Heater does the job intended. Purchased mainly for my RV camping. Our RV heater is good but way to loud. This heater is the perfect heater for RV camping plus "QUIET". The rotation motion of the heater is also a plus in providing heat throughout the area.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S Walker

customer_reviews.title: it can be programmed for 8 hours
customer_reviews.text: This heater is quiet, rotates, which allowed it to be installed in the aisle and heats several small rooms at once. It is tall, so it looks good for the interior, quite aesthetically pleasing and uncommon. I like that it can be programmed for 8 hours, that is, if you went to bed you can configure it to turn on after 7-8 hours and warm up the desired area. I use it for part of the house until I don't want to turn on the heat. Black looks decent
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: my bedroom is generally a little cooler than the rest of the house (in the cold months) and this little heater keeps me and my kitty nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Betker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t throw heat very well
customer_reviews.text: Ok I’ll be honest, for home use no idea how this unit works, but for a garage! This sucks! With a capital S! Iam sitting about 4 feet away and it’s 40 degrees outside and I barely feel the heat!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron St.Clair

customer_reviews.title: Come with the remote, great heater!
customer_reviews.text: You can control the heater by the remote attached instead of getting up.Convenient!!I bought it for using in my small office and it puts out a good amount of heat in short amount of the time(about 3 second).Oscillation function is so amazing!The swing distributes the heat relatively evenly around the room.Don’t worry about the cold winter any more!
customer_reviews.author: BrandonR

customer_reviews.title: So far, So good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Been getting cold mornings lately and I needed a heater. It's small but puts out enough to heat up my living room and dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great in a smaller room. We use it in a large basement, which I wouldn't expect to heat, but it keeps a section of it nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: michael stone

product_meta.title: Aikoper Space Heater, 1500W Ceramic Tower Heater, Portable Electric Oscillating Heater with Adjustable Thermostat, ECO Mode, Remote Control, 8-Hrs Timer, Overheat & Tip-over Protection for Indoor Use
product_meta.description:
Warm Prompt
1.When this space heater tipped-over, the LED display will flash 15s then shut off.
2.The warning on the package box was required by California Proposition 65.
3.Remote installation has attached on the related video.

Specifications
√2 Heating Settings（900/1500W)
√ECO Mode Adjusts Heat Output to Lower Costs 
√Remote Control
√8-Hours Timer
√Large LED Display
√Adjustable Digital Thermostat
√Overheat & Tip-over Protection
√Children Lock Function
√Stay Cool Body
√Dimension 24.09'' x 8.07'' x 7.64'' 

What’s in the box
1 * Space tower heater
1 * User’s manual
1 * Remote Control(battery included)
feature_bullets: 【 Meet Your Heating Needs】Maximum 1500w power and 2 heat settings provide efficient heat into every part of the room that needs constant heat in cold weather. Temperature adjustment by 1°F interval allows you to customize your preference temperature.

【Get Instant Warmth】This ceramic tower heater warms the air around you by creating a mild current of heat,quickly heat-up with ceramic heating technology, ideal for getting rid of the cold instantly. Requiring no assembly and a carry handle allow portable use.
【LOWER YOUR ENERGY BILLS】 ECO setting allows the heater turning on/off automatically by comparing the room tempreture with setted tempreture, which could maximum opitimize your energy consumption.

【BACKED WITH SAFETY 】The tower heater with auto shut off provides reliable tip-over and overheat protection.Safe for families with kids or pets who may knock it down . 8-hours timer ensures just the right time warm comfort with peace of mind.
【Worry-free After sale】We take pride in the quality and after-sale service of our ceramic tower heater. Any question, contact with us via the Amazon mailbox, you will get solution in 24 hours.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,038 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
